name: Archaeo
description:
Discover as many gems as you can within the time limit.

Submission for Godot Wild Jam #19: Discovery. Adheres to all 3 optional challenges: communication is done through icons, there is a colorblind option, and the tiles can be destroyed.

The controls are meant to be conveyed non-verbally in-game, but if you need help:

W/S, UP/DOWN, and the scroll wheel move the camera up or down.

You can mark blocks to dig with  left click, and un-mark them with right click.

The falling power-ups can be left-clicked to add time to the timer.

Github:

https://github.com/Jawfish/Archaeo

Music used:

Takeover of the 8-bit Synths by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4459-takeover-of-the-8-bit-synths
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
